alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 6:04AM EST until February 05 at 1:17PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Jackson and Barrow Counties. For the Middle Oconee River...including Auburn, Winder, Arcade, Athens...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A few dirt access roads will be flooded. A residential yard just downstream will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EST Saturday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM EST Saturday was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.5 feet on 01/04/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
